content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: BGSTRESU
      operator: is_unique_set
      value: BGTESTCD
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.153
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --BGSTRESU is not consistent within BGTESTCD
Outcome:
  Message: BGSTRESU is not consistent within BGTESTCD
  Output Variables:
    - BGSTRESU
    - BGTESTCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '153'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The BGORRESU may change over the course of the study,
                  e.g., g to kg, but the BGSTRESU should remain consistent throughout
                  the course of the study.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - BG

json.Description: Trigger error when --BGSTRESU is not consistent within BGTESTCD

Outcome.Message: BGSTRESU is not consistent within BGTESTCD

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The BGORRESU may change over the course of the study, e.g., g to kg, but the BGSTRESU should remain consistent throughout the course of the study.
